name: Kris Srikkanth's book cricket
description:
Get the ultimate book cricket game & relive the fantasy of the all time favourite cricket game!
Kris Srikkanth's book cricket is addiction & nostalgia in one! Take your team to the top of the world and experience in game commentary from the Former Indian cricket captain himself!
How often have you scribbled numbers at the top of your school text book?
How often have clapped with the flipping pages of a novel, searching for numbers more than the story?
The ending number of a page in a book always held prime importance in deciding between victory and defeat!
Nostalgia strikes like never before with Zealcity studios’ latest creation, Kris Srikkanth’s Book Cricket T20 edition.
The name attached to this very game makes it even more interesting with quick flips deciding the fate of a cricket match. This addictive version of book cricket, along with letting you relive your childhood fantasy also lets you play the Book cricket challenge.
Here’s an opportunity to show the world that you are the king of book cricket. Rekindle your lost passion of books and cricket.
